page.title: 05Hillmorton
page.content: Hillmorton is in Wawickshire.The main road through Hillmorton is the A428.There are four churches here ,St. John the Baptist church,the Methodist church,the Roman Catholic church and the Rugby Fellowship church.Hillmorton First School is in Watts Lane and the Middle School is in Moat Farm Drive. English Martyrs R.C.School is in High Street and Hillmorton Paddox school is in Fareham Avenue.These are both combined schools.From September 1985 most secondary age children will go to Ashlawn School which is for boys and girls up to the age of 18 years. Hillmorton has four public houses,one hotel/restaurant, a Royal British Legion Club and an Ex-Servicemen's Club.There are two supermarkets and other small shops.The main B'ham to Euston railway line is on the edge of Hillmorton,and also the Oxford Canal.
